local.maven.tdd.servicesExcercise1

Interface ServicesShoppingCart

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServicesImp

    public interface ServicesShoppingCart
    Interface to control a Shopping Cart. The user of this interface will be able to create multiple different carts, add items to a specific cart, remove items from a specific cart, retrieve the collection of items of a specific cart, get the sum of the prices of all the items in a specific cart, and delete a specific cart.
    Author:
    juan.piza

    • Method Detail

      • createCart

        int createCart()
        This method creates a cart. It returns a number which corresponds to the id of the cart created.
        Returns:
        int

      • addItem

        boolean addItem(Item item,
                int cartId)
        This method adds an item to an specific cart. If the Item is added successfully, the method will return true, otherwise it will return false
        Parameters:
        item, - is the Item Object to be added.
        cartId, - is the id of the cart to which the Item will be add.
        Returns:
        true, false

      • removeItem

        boolean removeItem(Item item,
                   int cartId)
        This method removes an item from an specific cart. If the Item is removed successfully, the method will return true, otherwise it will return false.
        Parameters:
        item, - is the Item Object to be removed.
        cartId, - is the id of the cart to which the Item will be removed.
        Returns:
        true, false

      • retrieveCart

        java.util.ArrayList<Item> retrieveCart(int cartId)
        This method retrieves a collection of Items from a specific cart.
        Parameters:
        cartId, - is the id of the cart to which the itemList will be retrieved.
        Returns:
        true, false

      • getTotal

        double getTotal(int cartId)
        This method sums the prices of all the items in a specific cart. It returns the sum of the prices of all the items in a specific cart.
        Parameters:
        cartId, - is the id of the cart to which the sum of the product's prices will be made.
        Returns:
        double

      • removeCart

        boolean removeCart(int cartId)
        This method removes a specific cart from the collection of carts. If the cart is removed successfully, the method will return true, otherwise it will return false.
        Parameters:
        cartId, - is the id of the cart to be removed.
        Returns:
        true, false
